interactivity.requirements: 15 Kirin Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Love, Dorms, and Other Things " from Kirin Kanda

progression.synopsis: At soccer practice, Sensei is informed that Kirin is dying. She is actually just doing sit-ups under the supervision of Miku and Karin , who think that she isn't training hard enough. She wants to take a shower when she finishes, and asks Sensei to "help". In the course of opposing this, Miku accidentally reveals that she felt something at the Halloween party, although Karin doesn't get it.
trivia: There are some minor differences depending on what Sensei told Karin about his relationship with Kirin.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.14.
